title: Iscariot, Horror
description:
I was the second lead developer on a project. I designed the interface, wrote a lot of the scripts (mainly frontend), and worked on the story.
The game was released in 2024, and has long since lost its relevance.

title: Lost Destiny, RPG
description:
UNRELEASED.
My first BIG solo project, which was started and abandoned in 2023. It features fully functional Race and Combat systems.

title: Monster Mash, Roguelike
description:
UNRELEASED. No game sounds or animations on the video.
A recent vampire-survivors-like project that was abandoned due to lack of development time and money. Here I was HEAVILY involved in the scripting, using Parallel Luau for the mob spawn system.
UI was designed and implemented by me.
